text: thm baeathana min baed nuh rusulana 'iilaa aqwamhm (hwdana wsalhana wa'iibrahim wlwtana wsheybana wghyrahm) faja' kl rasul qawmih balmejzat aldalt ealaa rsalth, waealaa sihat ma deahm 'ilyh, fama kanuu lysddiqu wyemlu bima kdhdhab bih qawm nuh wman sbqhm min al'umam alkhaly. wakama khatam allah ealaa qulub hwla' alaqwam falam ywmnu, kdhlk yakhtim ealaa qulub man shabhhm mmn baedihim min aladhin tajawazuu hudud allh, wkhalfu ma deahm 'iilayh rusuluhum min taeth euqubat lahum ealaa measyhm
